name: Ilegal City Streets Drag Racing
description:
Let's get ready to Drag your car in Tokyo and give a real car racing challenge to your rivals with your high velocity speed engine and nitro turbo car racing experience. A real dragging adventure begin when you've to ride on Tokyo highway illegally and show real crazy car stunts with your quad car adventure. So enjoy a real boosting adventure of dragging without steering. Just show your marvel dragging skills and become a real Tokyo City Drag Racing Champion.
A real racing challenge begin when you've a real sport car and loads of racing rivals behind you. Let's show your real furious face to all the rivals and become rael Dragging Legend.
Features
Loads of racing rivals.
Real racing challenge.
Drag and dodge to win racing battle.
Unlock from various sports car.
Enjoy real dragging adventure in Tokyo.
